title: Can't queue for ranked?
body: I'm just curious of something. Not sure if the season has ended or not, because I just picked the game back up after about 2-3 months of not playing. A couple days ago, I could queue for ranked, however, when I was queueing for Draft(I'm still scrubby, so I'm doing draft to learn the game more) and noticed Ranked and Flex queue was grayed out. Could I get some clarification, please? Lol. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Now my screen doesn't even show the rank option riot fix it pls
It sounds like you were trying to play while there was maintenance going on. Let me know if you still can't queue up for ranked though!
hi there is no ranked pick on the summoners rift, only blind and draft

hi, I have this problem since a month. I owe 21 champions already. I can play ranked but (twisted treeline) but summoners rift no. 
Help please.
WHY IS THERE NO RANKED ON SUMMONERS RIFT RIGHT NOW I CANT SEE IT

Yesterday, I was playing a game and my computer just freezed and I had to leave the game and get back to it. Afterwards, when i got in MINUTE 10, i got leaver buster. I waited the 20 minutes 4/5 games. The fifth game, my game crashed in champ select. Now I just got back and I see that I cant play ranked solo/queue or flex. Why the heck is this happening Riot Games?
Do you own 20 champions?  With the 10 ban system they bumped it from 16 to 20 champions before you can play draft or ranked games.

Yeah, I have like 70-80 champs, lol.
I think the queue was down, I can queue for it now.
Yo I cant queue up for ranked right now is the ranked queue still down?{{item:3070}}
